Choose this iconic Zagreb hotel as a place for a perfect family Easter – culinary delights, a selection of premium wines, piano music, and games for children are just part of an experience that will surely mark this Easter.

 

Easter Brunch at Zinfandel’s

 

Local ham roasted in bread dough, shortcrust pastry tarts with prawns, Esplanade’s traditional steak tartare hand-chopped and prepared by your table, cream soup of roasted tomatoes and fennel, Esplanade’s signature oven-crisped štrukli, creamy risotto with asparagus and veal Wellington are just some of the delicious dishes that you can find on the Easter menu at Zinfandel’s Restaurant. Under no circumstance should you skip our divine Easter desserts, created by the Esplanade’s pâtissiers, while piano music fills the restaurant, bringing with it a a cheerful mood. Your youngest ones will be animated by cheerful animators with numerous board games and fun activities.

 

Easter brunch is served on Easter, Sunday 09 April 2023, from 12:30 pm to 16:00 at Zinfandel’s restaurant (and the Oleander terrace, weather permitting). The number of guests is limited and it is recommended to book a table in advance. The price for Easter brunch with a glass of sparkling wine, entertainment for children, and a piano performance is EUR 145 (1.092,50 HRK) per person. The children’s menu is 75 EUR (565,09 HRK) per child.

 

Check the menu here.

 

Reservation at Zinfandel’s restaurant: 

+385 (0)1 4566 644 

zinfandels@esplanade.hr

 

 

Easter Weekend Package at the Esplanade

 

Toast to spring, explore Zagreb, and relax in the cheerful ambience of Zinfandel’s restaurant with a delicious feast of your favourite delicacies.

This spring, take your family on an Easter weekend trip to Zagreb. Explore the many attractions and sights of the city, stroll through the beautiful green parks, meet new people, indulge in the Easter tradition, and experience the amazing feeling of spring in the air.

The overnight package includes:

  • Overnight stay for two in the Superior Room (8 – 9 April 2023)
  • Early check-in / late check-out
  • À la carte breakfast or two in your room or at the restaurant
  • Sumptuous Easter lunch at Zinfandel’s restaurant with a glass of sparkling wine, entertainment for children and a piano performance (Menu)
  • Free superfast wireless internet
  • Access to Health Club – option to use the fitness centre and sauna free of charge (with prior confirmed reservation)
  • Press Reader Hot Zone – download newspapers and magazines during your stay free of charge

Package price is 498 € (3.752,18 HRK).

  

Please note:

  • The offer is available subject to capacity availability on 8 – 09 April 2023
  • The number of packages and places in the restaurant is limited.
  • At an additional charge, it is possible to upgrade your room category.
  • VAT is included in the price of the package.
  • The price of the package is for two people in the Superior Room
  • Fixed conversion rate is €1 = HRK 7.53450.
  • Tourist tax in the amount of €1.6 per person per day is not included in the price.
  • All other services that are not listed in the package are subject to additional charges and can be ordered in advance when booking the package.

 

Round off your stay at the Esplanade

(all additional services are charged according to the valid price list or menu):

  • Facial and body massages and treatments are available at the Health Club Esplanade – prior appointment is required, treatments are charged according to the displayed price list
  • Limousine ride– price available on request
  • Afternoon tea for two at the Esplanade bar, selection of teas, snacks, and desserts on a tiered stand, €35.83 (HRK 270) – prior table reservation required
  • Lunch or dinner at Zinfandel’s restaurant or at Le Bistro – à la carte offer, prior table reservation required
  • Esplanade štrukli at Le Bistro, portion €11.28 (HRK 85) – prior table reservation required

 

Package reservations and additional information:

Phone: +385 (0)1 4566 666

reservations@esplanade.hr

 

Published: March 20th 2023
